===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[erhua]] (refers to the r-coloring or addition of the {{zh-l|兒}} sound (transcribed in IPA as /ɚ/) to syllables in spoken Mandarin Chinese)

====Usage notes====
Erhua is mainly used in Beijing and northern dialects.
: {{zh-x|事'''兒{r}'''|business, matter}}
: {{zh-x|瓶'''兒{r}'''|bottle}}
: {{zh-x|公園-'''兒{r}'''|park}}
: {{zh-x|把-'''兒{r}'''|handle}}

The above examples of erhua are not [[w:Standard Chinese|standard Mandarin]], but there are some cases where erhua is used in standard Mandarin:
: {{zh-x|這'''兒{r}'''|here}}
: {{zh-x|那'''兒{r}'''|there}}
: {{zh-x|哪'''兒{r}'''|where}}
: {{zh-x|一點'''兒{r}'''|a bit}}

Sometimes, peoples from southern China have difficulty with erhua, so, for example, they would prefer to use {{zh-l|這裡}} instead of {{zh-l|這兒}} and {{zh-l|一點}} instead of {{zh-l|一點兒}}.

In some case, erhua can change the meaning of a word.
* {{zh-l|頭|head}} → {{zh-l|頭兒|leader}}
* {{zh-l|白麵|flour}} → {{zh-l|白麵兒|heroin}}
